actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals who have attained age 65 a refundable tax credit for property taxes paid by them on their principal residences or for a certain portion of the rent they pay for their principal residences.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a limited, refundable tax credit to persons age 65 or over for the real property taxes, or rent they pay for their principal residences.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals who have attained age 65 a refundable tax credit for property taxes paid by them on their principal residences or for a certain portion of the rent they pay for their principal residences.
